name: Dark Souls III: Ashes of Ariandel
name_original: Dark Souls III: Ashes of Ariandel
description: You, are the unkindled. As part of the Dark Souls™ III Season Pass, expand your Dark Souls™ III experience with the Ashes of Ariandel™ DLC pack. Journey to the snowy world of Ariandel and encounter new areas, bosses, enemies, weapons, armor set, magic spells and more. Will you accept the challenge and embrace the darkness once more?
